languages.text: Whenever an enemy attack deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to this creature greater than <u>15% of the creature's maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}</u>, this creature gains +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}.
languages.original_text: Всякий раз, когда враг наносит этому существу более <u>15% от его максимального {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}</u>, существо получает +5 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближнему Бою{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Силе{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Whenever an enemy attack deals damage to this creature greater than <u>15% of the creature's maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}</u>, this creature gains +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}.

Whenever an enemy attack deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to this creature greater than <u>15% of the creature's maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}</u>, this creature gains +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}.

Whenever an enemy attack deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to this creature greater than <u>15% of the creature's maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}</u>, this creature gains +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}.

languages.text: Всякий раз, когда враг наносит этому существу более <u>15% от его максимального {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}</u>, существо получает +5 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближнему Бою{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Силе{/g}.

traits.locale_text: [Draft] Всякий раз, когда врага наносит этому существу более 15% от максимального количества его здоровья, существо получает +5 к ББ и СИЛ.

languages.text: Fügt ein feindlicher Angriff dieser Kreatur mehr {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} als <u>15 % ihrer maximalen {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} zu</u>, erhält sie +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Waffenfähigkeit{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Stärke{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever an enemy attack deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to this creature greater than <u>15% of the creature's maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}</u>, this creature gains +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Wann immer ein feindlicher Angriff dieser Kreatur mehr Schaden als <u>15 % ihrer maximalen {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} zufügt</u>, erhält sie +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Waffenfertigkeit{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Stärke{/g}.

languages.text: Chaque fois qu'une attaque ennemie inflige à cette créature des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} supérieurs à <u>15 % de la réserve de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} maximum de la créature</u>, elle bénéficie d'un bonus de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Capacité de combat{/g} et de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Force{/g} de +5.
languages.original_text: Whenever an enemy attack deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to this creature greater than <u>15% of the creature's maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}</u>, this creature gains +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Chaque fois qu'une attaque ennemie inflige à cette créature des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} supérieurs à <u>15 % de la réserve de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} maximum de la créature</u>, elle bénéficie d'un bonus de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Capacité de combat{/g} et de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Force{/g} de +5.

languages.text: 每当敌方攻击此生物，造成的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}高于<u>此生物最大{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}的15%</u>时，此生物的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}力量{/g}提高5点。
languages.original_text: Whenever an enemy attack deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to this creature greater than <u>15% of the creature's maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}</u>, this creature gains +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 每当敌方攻击对此生物，造成的伤害高于<u>此生物最大{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}的15%</u>时，此生物的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}力量{/g}提高5点。

languages.text: Cuando un ataque enemigo inflige {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} a esta criatura superior al <u>15 % de sus {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} máximas</u>, la criatura gana +5 a su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Habilidad de armas{/g} y a su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Fuerza{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever an enemy attack deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to this creature greater than <u>15% of the creature's maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}</u>, this creature gains +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Cuando un ataque enemigo inflige daño a esta criatura superior al <u>15 % de sus {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} máximas</u>, la criatura gana +5 a su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Habilidad de armas{/g} y a su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Fuerza{/g}.

languages.text: 敵の攻撃が、<u>この生物の最大の{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}の15%</u>より大きい生物に{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与えた場合、この生物は{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}近接攻撃{/g}および{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}腕力{/g}に+5を獲得する。
languages.original_text: Whenever an enemy attack deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to this creature greater than <u>15% of the creature's maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}</u>, this creature gains +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 敵の攻撃が、<u>この生物の最大の{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}の15%</u>より大きい生物にダメージを与えた場合、この生物は{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器スキル{/g}および{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}腕力{/g}に +5を獲得する。

languages.text: Bir düşman saldırısı bu yaratığa <u>yaratığın maksimum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık{/g} puanının %15'inden fazla</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} verdiğinde yaratık, +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Silah Yeteneği{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Kuvvet{/g} kazanır.
languages.original_text: Whenever an enemy attack deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to this creature greater than <u>15% of the creature's maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}</u>, this creature gains +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}.
